sentences.sContent: The question of how the first stars evolved is so important because their formations and eventual explosions provided the seeds for subsequent stars to come into being.
sentences.sContent_eng: The question of how the first stars evolved is so important because their formations and eventual explosions provided the seeds for subsequent stars to come into being.
sentences.sCn: 关于第一批恒星的形成问题非常重要，因为它们的形成乃至最终爆炸，为以后恒星的形成提供了种子。
